Articles.Content:
Since i wasnt able to find a topic about this yet - i thought i may post it.

Just found this trailer and its really very well made.

Yet this made me wonder, i also just recently saw a documentation about space-exploration - what made me wonder is the different public-image that NASA was able to create for example with the voyager missions.

Have people lost interrest in space-exploration or have agencie simply failed to do proper public-relations?

I mean it cant be that hard to make space travel interresting again for a broad public. Just look at things like Mars-One or Space X they get huge public resonance.

Some people probably dont think its that important but by making space-exploration interresting for the broad public funding will also grow.

So what do you think has changed?

I really dont understand why space-programs arent supported way more these days. Especially thinking about how much money is spent for pointless things.

(BTW. great trailer)
